name: New UX Writer Info-Gathering Sessions
description:
Are you the first UX writer on a team? Feel free to use this template to help you get to know your new colleagues! Uncover opportunities and set yourself up for success in your new role.


By the end of your sessions, youâ€™ll understand if (and how) your colleagues have worked with UX writers in the past. You'll uncover writing challenges that you can help solve and be ready to start making an impact.
